item.title: Hail Command error
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Ok i got this hail command and i am having trouble with 2 lines of code

Under “public class client extends Player implements Runnable {”
I placed this code

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrtext = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrtextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

Then i went to my commands and put this code there

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); }

but when i compile i get this error

client.java:31: cannot find symbol symbol : variable plrtext location: class client castOn.plrtext = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; ^ client.java:32: cannot find symbol symbol : variable plrtextUpdateRequired location: class client castOn.plrtextUpdateRequired = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Anyone know what a did wrong?

Read full topic
